snippet: The European Commission has accused the Chinese government of unfairly subsidizing makers of solar panels, a day after the United States imposed duties on Chinese solar products.
abstract: European Commission ramps up its investigation of the Chinese solar panel industry by accusing Chinese government of unfairly subsidizing panel makers; decision comes one day after the United States made final decision to impose duties on billions of dollars of solar products from China over the next five years.
lead_paragraph: The European Commission has accused the Chinese government of unfairly subsidizing makers of solar panels, a day after the United States imposed duties on Chinese solar products.

headline.main: Europe Intensifies Chinese Solar Panel Investigation
headline.print_headline:
Europe Increases Scrutiny
Of Solar Industry in China
